title: nava hAyanamide
sahitya:
nava hAyanamide vaccenu lEmA navulaku hAyini iccunulE


anupallavi

  nava caitanyamulO bhuvanamu nandavanamuna indra bhavanamaunulE


caraNam    sAyudha savvaDi vAyu mUla vinanAyE bhayamu lEdani muraLI mrOyagA 
manadE jayamani vijaya dundubhi ninadincE ninadincE ninadincE
